name: Realme 7i
description: Realme 7i smartphone was launched on 17th September 2020. The phone comes with a 6.50-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 720x1600 pixels. Realme 7i is powered by a 2GHz octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 662 processor. It comes with 8GB of RAM. The Realme 7i runs Android 10 and is powered by a 5000mAh battery. The Realme 7i supports proprietary fast charging.
